title: Caterpillar Stock Hit a Record Wednesday-AI Had a Lot To Do With It
description: Caterpillar reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue on demand for equipment needed for artificial intelligence data centers.
content: Caterpillar (CAT) shares skyrocketed to an all-time high when the big farm and construction machines maker easily beat profit and sales expectations, with strong demand for data center power-generation equipment more than offsetting tariff headwinds.... [1080 chars]

title: Apple hits $4 trillion market value as new iPhone models revitalize sales
description: APPLE briefly topped $4 trillion in market value for the first time on Tuesday, the third Big Tech company to hit the milestone, as robust demand for its latest iPhone models allayed fears over its slow progress in the artificial intelligence (AI) race.
content: APPLE briefly topped $4 trillion in market value for the first time on Tuesday, the third Big Tech company to hit the milestone, as robust demand for its latest iPhone models allayed fears over its slow progress in the artificial intelligence (AI) ra... [3124 chars]

title: AI fraud is the new office scam as employees fake expense receipts

title: Amazon to invest $5 billion in South Korea AI data centers
description: SEOUL — Amazon will invest over $5 billion to build artificial intelligence (AI) data centers in South Korea by 2031, Seoul said Wednesday, calling it the country’s largest-ever foreign investment.
content:
SEOUL — Amazon will invest over $5 billion to build artificial intelligence (AI) data centers in South Korea by 2031, Seoul said Wednesday, calling it the country’s largest-ever foreign investment.

title: SK hynix posts record $7.9-B profit on AI-driven chip boom
description: SEOUL ― South Korean chip giant SK hynix reported record profit in the third quarter on Wednesday, boosted by strong demand for artificial intelligence.
content:
SEOUL ― South Korean chip giant SK hynix reported record profit in the third quarter on Wednesday, boosted by strong demand for artificial intelligence.

title: Logitech's second-quarter earnings boosted by AI-enabled products
description: ZURICH ― Logitech on Tuesday reported better-than-expected sales and earnings for the second quarter as the computer peripherals maker sold more of its artificial intelligence-enabled products.
content:
ZURICH ― Logitech on Tuesday reported better-than-expected sales and earnings for the second quarter as the computer peripherals maker sold more of its artificial intelligence-enabled products.

title: Microsoft holds 27% of OpenAI in revamped partnership
description: SAN FRANCISCO ― Microsoft and OpenAI announced on Tuesday a sweeping overhaul of their landmark artificial intelligence (AI) partnership, giving both companies greater independence while maintaining their close collaboration.

title: India Ramps Up AI Use for Military
description: India is investing heavily in artificial intelligence to transform its armed forces.
content:

title: Character.AI to ban children under 18 from talking to its chatbots
description: Artificial intelligence startup Character.AI will ban kids from having conversations with chatbots on its platform following growing pressure from lawmakers and a raft of lawsuits alleging the company's so-called characters are responsible for harms to children.
